{{Client event}}
 
<div style="border: 1px dotted blue; background: #00CC66;padding:4px;margin-bottom:2px;">'''Note''':  This event should only be used as a low-level function for advanced users.  For typical Voice scripting, please see the [[/Resource:Voice.md|Voice Resource]]</div>
This event is triggered when a player stops talking through voice chat.

==Parameters==
No parameters.

==Source==
The [[/event_system#Event_source.md|source]] of this event is the player [[/element.md|element]] that just stopped talking through voice chat.

==Cancel effect==
* If the [[/event_system#Event_source.md|source]] is the local player, the local player will not broadcast his voice chat to the server
* If the [[/event_system#Event_source.md|source]] is a remote player, the player who started talking will not be heard.

==Example== 
This example outputs to the console the player that stopped talking.
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">addEventHandler("onClientPlayerVoiceStop",root,function()
	outputConsole(getPlayerName(source)..." has stopped talking.")
end)
</syntaxhighlight>
